faq.question: When is the wedding?
faq.answer: Our wedding will take place over the entire weekend, Friday to Sunday, of the 22nd to the 24th of March.

faq.question: Where in Matjiesfontein is the wedding taking place?
faq.answer: Our guests will be taking over the entire Matjiesfontein for the weekend, and the wedding events will take place at different locations around the town.

faq.question: What time do we need to be there on Friday
faq.answer: The spitbraai wil start on Friday at around 16h30. Food will be ready from 19h00 onwards.

faq.question: Can we come earlier on Friday?
faq.answer: Thursday is a public holiday, and if you would like to take an extra long weekend we would love our guests to come through early on Friday to spend the day with us.

faq.question: What time can we check-in on Friday and check-out on Sunday?
faq.answer: Guests can check in on Friday from 11h00 and should check out by 11h00 on Sunday.

faq.question: Where do we check-in on Friday?
faq.answer: Guests need to check-in at the reception of the Hotel where they will get their room keys.

faq.question: Where do we eat breakfast, and from what time?
faq.answer: Breakfast is served in the Hotel dining room, and is available from 07h30 until 10h30 each morning. Guests do not have to pay for breakfast as it is included in their room price.

faq.question: What time do we need to be ready for the wedding on Saturday?
faq.answer: Guests need to be ready in front of the Hotel by 14h30 for the wedding on Saturday. From there, everyone will be led to the wedding ceremony area.

faq.question: Will there be a cash bar?
faq.answer: There is a cash bar on the Friday and Saturday night, but there are card facilities available as well.
